page.title: 16Farming
page.content: In our area there are five farms of different sizes. They grow crops like corn, hay, straw, strawberries and gooseberries. They keep different kinds of animals like cows, pigs, chickens, horses and sheep. Some farms have a little bit of Â£pick-your-own' strawberries, gooseberries and other soft fruit. Some of the animals go to Thame or Aylesbury markets. Some of the farms are mixed and arable. Some are all grass and rough pasture. One of the farms has mostly dairy cows and the farmer has a milk round. This farmer also keeps horses for show jumping. Two the farms are in Tetsworth village.
